scripts.build: set SHARP_DISABLE=1 && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); function copyDir(src, dest) { if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) { fs.mkdirSync(dest, { recursive: true }); } for (const item of fs.readdirSync(src, { withFileTypes: true })) { const srcPath = path.join(src, item.name); const destPath = path.join(dest, item.name); if (item.isDirectory()) { copyDir(srcPath, destPath); } else { fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destPath); } } } copyDir(path.join('..', 'static_api'), path.join('public', 'static_api'));" && astro build
